caption.p: LV administration mitigated lipid accumulation in liver. Images of liver tissue sections stained with Oil Red O ( a) and triglyceride ( b), total cholesterol levels ( c), and relative mRNA expressions of peroxisome proliferator-activated receptor-alpha (PPAR) α and γ ( d) in liver tissues. All data are presented as the mean ± SEM. One-way ANOVA and Duncan’s multiple range test were conducted. Different superscripts within groups indicate significant differences at p < 0.05
